name: Planetary Protector
description:
Made for Trijam 79: "Anti-gravity" and "If you play with fire, you get burned."

Dev-Time: 3 hours.  // Engine: Construct 3

Programming and Art: Cocco

Music: D. Fasching

Defend the earth from incoming asteroids by aligning the newly developed anti-gravity shield using your cursor. When returning the burning asteroids to the vastness of space, keep in mind that inevitably, if you play with fire, earth is going to get burned.
